src_original: yāvad apareṇa samayena teṣāṃ buddhir utpannā; (MSV III 126)  asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ parasparaṃ sakhyenāvasthitāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā avivadamānāḥ;  kin tu na jānīmaḥ ko 'smābhiḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ iti;  yan nu vayaṃ yathāvṛddhikāṃ prajñapayema iti;  te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhā iti;
ko 'smākaṃ vṛddha iti;  tataḥ kapiṃjalena vaṭavṛkṣo darśitaḥ;  bhavantaḥ eṣa vaṭavṛkṣaḥ kena kiyatpramāṇo dṛṣṭa iti;
mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṃ dṛṣṭo matpramāṇa eva uccatveneti;
tgt_original: 「我昔見此樹在我腹下，今大如是。 以此推之，我應為長！

src_original: mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṃ dṛṣṭo mama tulya evoccatveneti;  te kathayanti;  tvam asya vṛddha iti;  śaśaḥ kathayati;  mayāpy asya dvipatrakasya patreṣv evāvaśyayanbindavo jihvayā nirlīḍhā iti;
te kathayanti:  tvam apy anayor vṛddha iti;

paśyata yūyam enaṃ vaṭavṛkṣaṃ mahatpramāṇākāram;  te kathayanti:  paśyāmaḥ; etasmān mayā phalāni bhakṣayitvāsmin pradeśe uccāraḥ kṛtas tasmād ayaṃ jāta iti; (A 315b)  te kathayanti:  yady evaṃ tvam asmākaṃ sarveṣāṃ vṛddha iti;
tgt_original: 「我於必鉢羅林中，食此樹果，子隨糞出，此樹得生。
